Sitapur is located at 88 km from Lucknow. This city is connected with Lakhimpur-Khiri too.
Eye Hospital founded by Late Dr Prakash Mehra.
Purbin Devi Temple, Bholia Baba, Puri's Temple (huge temple of Lord Shiva, Ram Sita Laxman, Krisna Radha), Pakke Taal, Jangli Nath. Shyam Nath Temple.
One can stay here for few days and do nothing only take rest. Roam around local areas greenery, local people and local market. One of the best lively place on the earth.
Naimisharanya the pilgrimage place for Hindus.
